<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Athletic Strategist](/Feats.aspx?ID=5940) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=818" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 107 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

</column>

---

You know how to calculatedly manipulate joints and body weight. In addition to using an attack stratagem's roll substitution for a Strike, you can use it to modify a [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=2383), [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376), [Reposition](/Actions.aspx?ID=2379), [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380), or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=2382) attempt, substituting your [Devise a Stratagem](/Actions.aspx?ID=2813) roll for the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check. You must apply the substitution to the first eligible attack you make, whether it's a Strike or one of the Athletics actions.

 You can also use your Intelligence modifier instead of Strength for the Athletics check when you substitute your Devise a Stratagem roll, unless you're using a weapon for the maneuver and the weapon doesn't fit the restrictions for using Intelligence with a stratagem.
name: Athletic Strategist
